string-array.name: description
string-array.item: Nice zesty stringy spinach artichoke dip.
Maybe something than Granny's fried home recipe.
A little Italian mixed with a lot of southern.
A simple home made french toast recipe.
Want to eat but don't want to cook, here's a quick fix for you.

string-array.name: ingredients
string-array.item: eggs, milk, cake mix, chocolate syrup, etc.
1lb of baby spinach, can of artichoke hearts, 3 choices of 8oz cheese, other things I'm sure.
8 chicken drumsticks, flour, seasonings of your choice, peanut oil
spaghetti noodles, olive oil, ground turkey or beef, spaghetti sauce, bbq, some peppers.
day old bread, vanilla extract, 1 egg, ground cinnamon
bread of your choice, processed or real cut turkey, some mayo, lettuce(not romaine, it's on recall), tomatoes, and hands.
